entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this evening with risk of thunderstorms. Snow level 500 metres. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 early this evening then becoming light this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Snow level near valley bottom. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 10. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers changing to 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers after midnight. Snow level near valley bottom. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 1 April 2023
